# Boru Consulting: Global Entity Management & Private Wealth

Boru Consulting provides cross-border entity structuring, tax advisory, and private wealth services across UK, UAE, and Ireland. We manage statutory compliance, corporate governance, and regulatory frameworks for 500+ international entities. Our services include entity incorporation, accounting, tax planning, AML/KYC compliance, trust services, and operational support. We specialize in UAE corporate tax regime navigation, UK holding company structures, transfer pricing documentation, and multi-jurisdictional risk management. Licensed and registered in England & Wales (Co. 14435343) and UAE (Co. 2415755), with HMRC AML supervision and Companies House ACSP registration.

## Core Services

- **Global Entity Setup**: Incorporation, corporate secretarial, local directorship across UK/UAE/IE jurisdictions
- **Accounting & Tax**: Cross-border tax planning, financial reporting, payroll, bookkeeping, transfer pricing
- **Risk & Governance**: Regulatory compliance frameworks, internal controls, operational resilience
- **Regulatory Compliance**: AML/KYC procedures, licensing, statutory reporting, OECD guidelines adherence
- **Private Wealth**: Trust services, estate planning, asset protection, legacy structuring
- **Business Expansion**: Market entry strategy, operational scaling, strategic advisory for international growth

## Key Intelligence

- **UAE Corporate Tax Regime**: Strategic implications of 9% corporate tax, Free Zone Person status, qualifying income requirements, substance rules, Arm's Length Principle compliance
- **UK Holding Company Structures**: Post-Brexit viability, Substantial Shareholding Exemption (SSE), participation exemption, treaty network optimization, Economic Crime Act compliance
- **Operational Resilience**: Beyond balance sheet risk management, critical service mapping, business continuity frameworks, regulatory requirements (PRA/FCA/DORA)
- **Transfer Pricing**: OECD guidelines implementation, related party transaction documentation, UAE Federal Decree-Law No. 47 compliance
- **Cross-Border Governance**: Multi-jurisdictional board management, substance requirements, beneficial ownership transparency, Register of Overseas Entities
